a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTCholeraWCVaccinesLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC vaccines) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a cholera vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Whole-cell (WC) vaccines schedule * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTCholeraWCVaccinesLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient
Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 1 year

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "Client's age is more than or equal to 1 year"
"One cholera primary series dose was administered"
"The latest cholera dose was administered less than 14 days ago"

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as client\'s age is under 1 year. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first cholera dose.'
"Client is not due for cholera vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 14 days ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as no doses have been given.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered more than 14 days ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for cholera vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the booster series for cholera was completed more than 3 years ago. Check for contraindications.'
